import React from 'react'; import '../App.css'; import { Button } from './ValuesButton'; import './About.css'; function AboutSection() { return (

About

London-based Finance and Technology startup which provides consulting, analysis and project delivery and develops prototypes.



Founder: Adrian Hough, BCom, MBA


Finance, Risk and Change professional with experience working at Deutsche Bank, Centrica Energy, RBC Capital and Bank of America in London. Passionate about developing IT solutions which improve the functioning of Financial Markets.


Successfully delivered projects for asset classes such as Commodities, Structured Finance (ABS, CMBS & CRE), Derivatives, Fixed Income and Emerging Markets.


Winner of the 2019 Centre for Finance, Technology and Entrepreneurship (CFTE) Onfido Extrapreneurship competition and member of the CFTE alumni committee.

); } export default AboutSection;
